sru:extraResponseData.fcs:transformedQuery: SELECT ndx.txt, base.entry, base.sid, COUNT(*) FROM apc_eng_002 AS base INNER JOIN (SELECT ndx.id, ndx.txt FROM (SELECT tab.id, tab.xpath, tab.txt FROM apc_eng_002_ndx AS tab INNER JOIN (SELECT inner.id FROM apc_eng_002_ndx AS `inner` WHERE inner.txt = 'released' AND inner.xpath LIKE '%-change-f-status-') AS prefid ON tab.id = prefid.id WHERE tab.txt != '-') AS ndx WHERE (ndx.txt = '4') AND ((ndx.xpath LIKE '%-bibl-%Course-'))) AS ndx ON base.id = ndx.id GROUP BY base.sid LIMIT 0, 1000
